name: oneiric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like a dream, or relating to dreams: The film thrills with its indelible, oneiric imagery. These two dreams illustrate two possible points of view for the same oneiric phenomenon.
More examplesFewer examplesThis weird colour saturation had an immediately oneiric quality.The study of the relation between mental health and oneiric lucidity is an important part of the research on lucid dreaming.This so-called dream is no more oneiric than the images which precede it.
